parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Prepares the camera position relative to the current position of the currect target (see [[camPrepareTarget]]). Needs the call of [[camCommitPrepared]] to be conducted.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camPrepareRelPos''' position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format ([[PositionRelative]])

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _camera '''camPrepareRelPos''' [10,5,-2]   </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camPreload]], [[camCommitPrepared]], [[camSetRelPos]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
